item.title: Using Azure WebJobs to Automate Stuff

item.title: Fiddler and APIs
item.description: A while ago I blogged about promoting my blog with Buffer. At the time I made use of the nuget package BufferAPI but lets look at some improvements I can make.

item.title: How do I add Power BI data to a webpage?
item.description: Last week I talked about Power BI, what it is and some of the different services you can use with it. This week lets add some of that data to a simple web page.
